node.doctext:
"SoPW" is a common abbreviation for [id://479], the section for general Perl questions (see also [id://89535]). A form for asking a new Perl question can be found at the [href://?node_id=479#post|bottom] of that page (but please review [id://483077] first).

Back to the [PerlMonks FAQ]
node.title: What is SoPW?
